website_summaries.verdict: This belt delivers bilateral support to help alleviate hernia pain.
pros: Belt features hook-and-loop tape on both sides and is simple to adjust at any time
Includes removable pads for added convenience
Designed to wear under clothing for as long as you choose
Adjustable straps help deliver the perfect fit
cons: Tends to rub against the skin, which can make the belt uncomfortable to wear

customer_reviews.title: if you know your hurt, this will help.
customer_reviews.text: this product looks completely stupid, is a bit silly but if you can overlook the oddity and understand your really hurt bad it helps. you can put the support where you need it exactly using the removable pads. this is not the cure to surgery but it will help you until you have surgery. I didn't want it, would not buy it but when my wife bought it and forced me to try it... it helped.
customer_reviews.author: frost50cal

customer_reviews.title: It's too bad this item can't be returned because he can't wear ...
customer_reviews.text: The hernia belt arrived one day late, but that was okay. My husband has tried to wear the belt for 4 days. However he states unlike his other belt, this one rubs his skin and rides up making it very uncomfortable to wear and requiring continual adjustments. It's too bad this item can't be returned because he can't wear it and I've already had to order another belt for him.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Watts

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's hard to build a fits all, fixes all Hernia belt and this Wonder Care product proves it. The Plus's: it's light weight, breathable and I liked the waist band adjustment. The Minus's: it's uncomfortable, the leg strap adjustment is a joke and the insert pads made my issue worse not better. They don't look professionally designed or made. I tried it because it was cheap in cost, proving you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Fryar

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Product was too small. It states a M would fit up to 38 and it does not. When I tried to return found out it cannot be returned. Does not state this I the description. Had I known would not have purchased, Waste of money for someone on a fixed income. Another rip off on Amazon site. Amazon needs to police these people better.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Dunn Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for an uncomfortable situation
customer_reviews.text: I encountered a hernia and didn't know or understand what was happening. Had I known about this belt prior , I would not have exacerbated it prior to getting it treated by surgery. I found it comfortable and kept my stuff in place. It is not a fix, but rather to help ease the pain and aggravation. It is not a safety device but rather a temporary support after it happens. Do not use this as prevention device, that is not the intention or purpose. It will definitely make you more comfortable by easing the pain of a minor hernia.
customer_reviews.author: Bob E.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a spare for washing. This belt was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a spare for washing. This belt was $15.00 less than my original purchase. The original had long straps that needed tone trimmed to insure proper fit. This belt used a different approach. The straps were looped on belt : and can be moved to insure proper placement of the pad. The difference between the more original and this belt is that the original pads are flat on the side next to your body and fit into pockets on the belt. The pads on this belt are curved on both sides and are velvcroed to the belt. I only use one side.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than another purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a second try to find a belt to help with bilateral hernias. The first was about $24 and recommended by the DR. as being recommended by his other patients. We found it to be weak in all of the areas listed above--comfort, ease of use, and quality of material. Just by comparison, on the first day, this belt is 10X better and so is given 5 stars. Is it the ultimate answer? We're not worried about asking that question at this point.
customer_reviews.author: reluctant reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Hernia Go Away!
customer_reviews.text: This belt seems to have helped my dad. He is using it to help a hernia on his left side. The only thing I think he has trouble with is the two belts that come from the back to the front between his legs. This will be worked out, but maybe if they were made of a different material that just had the velcro on the ends it may not bother his legs so bad. I do think the size of his hernia has decreased quite a bit since he has been using them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cox

customer_reviews.title: Would Give 6 Stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: Here is why I love this product: 1. Very light and flexible yet effective 2. Excellent Price 3. Strong velcro but no painful metal buckles 4. Good fit Note: I believe the truss was made in China. Perhaps a size 38 is different there. Initially my 38 ( I have a 37 waist) was too tight. Amazon sent me a slightly larger truss and it fits great.;
customer_reviews.author: Math Magician

customer_reviews.title: less expensive and better in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my dad who was having issues with an inguinal hernia. We paid $50 for another support at a local medical supply store. This one is simpler, less expensive and better in my opinion. The pads that go on either side are very firm and easy to place as they are velcro. The support we got from the medical supply store had inserts, they were flimsy and not as helpful. I willl say this does run a bit on the small side. We ordered a medium and dad is like a 34 waist. It's pretty tight but that's the way we want it so it stays in place. Good product and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works Surprising Well
customer_reviews.text: So far, I find that this hernia belt works well. It reduces the hernia pain and is comfortable to wear. The belt seems very well designed. It is easy to adjust in order to create a proper fit. It places pressure very effectively on the hernia bulge which is the source of pain. I highly recommend this hernia belt.
customer_reviews.author: DrJohn

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life.  Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I recommend this without any doubt that it will make your life easier and reduce your discomfort. Those who have a lot of damage and have issues doing things like walking will have a wonderful experience when you don't have afull things happening around man land. I am finally able to get my work done and I have a lot more confidence in being able to do the things that I am responsible for.
customer_reviews.author: Chasing and racing

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my innards inside-life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a clue how to deal with a double hernia until I got one. A friend suggested a truss, which made me think of a tied up chicken on a turning spit. I found your product and had it really fast. Good thing too, my innards were popping around like a cat in a gunny sack. Every time I sneezed my innards popped in to visit the fellas down there! They didn't like the company at all. I got 3 pairs of them now and haven't had a blowout for a long time. Thanks for putting them on sale, I'll be ordering a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Trappy

customer_reviews.title: Looks well made and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made and sturdy support. Unfortunately I had to return it because my father is in denial of his need for this support belt, and doesn't understand human anatomy. The belt is supoosed to apply pressure the affected area of the lower abdominal wall, preventing your hernia muscles and internal organs from shifting into your inguinal canal...hopefully preventing any swelling to your nether regions. Hopefully, someonr rlse finds this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: msdependable

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This belt really does help support the bulging and assists with the pain. I am trying to avoid surgery. I own six and they are the best I can find for support. I need that many because they need to be laundered after each wearing. I wear it working in the yard, driving, walking, for any activity no matter the amount of activity. Can't do without it. My Doctor advises avoiding surgery as long as possible. So far, this is the best alternative I have been able to find.
customer_reviews.author: M E D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt for a friend who is 87 years old while waiting for surgery. This belt is the best one that we have tried so far. Because the pads are adjustable for a double hernia it fits perfectly and has kept my friend comfortable all day long. The only thing we found was that even though he usually buys large size underwear, the double extra large size in hernia belts was more comfortable and with the Velcro straps is very adjustable. As the two we bought wear out, we will buy more of the Wonder Care-Double Inguinal Hernia Support Belt. The price is also very reasonable when compared to other belts on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Retired in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great support for racers
customer_reviews.text: This belt fits great, supports double inguinal hernias, and I have even run trail races in it, without the pads! It’s light, low profile design is completely concealed by my racing shorts. I gave it five stars, because it’s SO well made... 😎
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.Shotsman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This support is amazing! I have to get this hernia worked on, but this support works perfectly in the meantime. I have to walk about 10 miles on a shift and it's not uncomfortable at all and does the trick. If you have a hernia or hernias in front, you HAVE to get this support!!! I don't notice the hernia at all when I'm wearing it. ...and it doesn't interfere with your junk at all. Make sure you get the right size based on waist length.
customer_reviews.author: mzo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this belt for my husband and he likes it a lot. His gratefruite size hernia retracted after one full day of wear. My husband said, "The belt is really comfortable to wear all day. However, I'm giving the support brace four stars because, my husband had to add duct tape around the edges of the velcro section, because it slightly irrated his skin.
customer_reviews.author: School Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has a hernia in his groin on the right side. It has helped extremely with his pain and keeping the hernia intact instead of popping out causing him pain. He likes the way it is very adjustable and you can even take one of the leg through straps out. He only uses the strap on the right side. it's also great that you can move the pads around in different directions to try to get the most comfortable position. I rate this belt very high.
customer_reviews.author: Love Nature

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. Did not work at all. Pads move and constantly needs to be adjusted. Unable to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship, poor design
customer_reviews.text: The upper part of this belt is well made but the inguinal straps are far too weak. I will need to rebuild them for my needs. I have no choice! The entire range of adjustments is too small for my smaller body! I like the width of the upper belt part. My hernia is so low however that I need to find ways to reach down to it below the belt however and that is a real disappointment. Iw illnot return it because I cannot just wait for something better. I am stuck with this halfway solution until I can find its replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Winter - Characteristics

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Wondercare Hernia Belt on 9/17. It arrived on 9/18. Although the Inguinal Belt is recommended for post surgery, I am using it for Pre-surgery. I am deciding on both the surgeon and the actual date of the procedure. The pain can be very uncomfortable depending on the time of day when out and about. The Wondercare Belt totally eliminated the discomfort and is allowing me more time to decide on the surgeon and the date and time for the surgery. It also allows me to drive my automobile without any discomfort during the process. I'm sure it will be even more effective after surgery!
customer_reviews.author: J. Coletti

customer_reviews.title: It helps.
customer_reviews.text: It helps... on light duty at work now before my surgery which is coming up soon... been a month and change now wearing this product and it has helped... I only have a left side hernia but I just got the double just to be on the safe side. Only thing I don't like is the waste part gets crinkled up pretty easily but I am active so I'm not too disappointed... also I wish the padding was a little better... in conclusion though I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lyric Ricardo coke

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be custom fit
customer_reviews.text: The problem is the fit, never could get it right. The reason I cannot wear this is because it doesn't not prevent my intestines from falling right into my scrotum but it sure as hell clamps my intestines after they drop out and gets in the way when I try to push everything back into my abdominal cavity.
customer_reviews.author: David Parker

customer_reviews.title: Just what my husband needed, his sSurgery date is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband needed, his sSurgery date is three weeks out and it really gives me peace of mind that he’ll have that support until he can get it repaired. My husband made the comment of that with the truss, at the end of the day he doesn’t feel as fatigued as he was feeling without it, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Hernia support
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very thankful for this support. We ordered a medium, and then ordered a small. The small was just right. He is slim 130 lbs..5'6". This is a very good support for him . He likes to play pickleball and needs it because his hernia popped out several weeks after surgery..Thank you !!!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Romano

customer_reviews.title: Take a pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: The belt is very well made however the pad that comes with it will give you a hernia if you don't already have one. Seriously, it's the size of my fist, egg shaped and far, far too firm. Sort of like strapping a can of beans against your body. Extremely uncomfortable. If it came with a better pad, I'd give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Brent

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Provided enough relief to continue working out and playing golf until surgery, which I could not have done without. Comfortable and can be worn all day. Wearable under clothes without showing through clothes. Unusual, but effective pads. My only complaint is that they fall off when taking off, but that's a minor nit. Can't answer on long term use, but does provide good relief
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a second one so I would always have a clean one available. It is of good quality and comfortable once you learn to use it properly. My wife sewed it up so that all it takes is one leg through each side, adjust the egg and pull it up. And since the location of hernia doesn't really move, it is easy to mark the exact location for the egg making it super easy to remove and put on.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT, BUT;....
customer_reviews.text: Really helped first 5 days then the crotch straps started bending the back belt over and making it uncomfortable. If the straps would have been attached to the side of the belt instead of looping around it, it would have been perfect because there is already a way to adjust in front. The belt has really helped and was worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hofer

customer_reviews.title: I complained to Wonder Care that the models in their ...
customer_reviews.text: I complained to Wonder Care that the models in their pictures showed loops on the straps that ran from the crotch to back waist and those straps kept sliding between my buttocks, very uncomfortable. WC said they'd send me a replacement with loops. That was three weeks ago. I haven't got it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Ironhand

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL -- CANNOT USE AND CANNOT RETURN
customer_reviews.text: Way too small and could not return it -- even though I never put it on and it is still in the original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Bozo

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to figure out the best way to wear this, but once I figured it out, it worked well. It works best with underwear that have a definite pouch. The wide band fits best around my hips, rather than my waist - it rides kind of low on me. The two straps that go between your legs are adjustable; when you wear this over underwear, the straps can't be too tight, or it causes "bunching" As I said, once I figured out best fit, best position, etc. it works well and is fairly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kent C.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: This brace is great. I got one to relieve pain and pressure while waiting for surgery. I'm still waiting so still wearing it. I don't need it all the time, mostly afternoons when I( am on my feet a lot. I found it stays in place without using the under the leg straps so not uncomfortable at all. It feels similar to wearing a back brace. Would definitely recommend and buy if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Creeker 13

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This is helping my husband tremendously until he can get a surgery in November to fix the hernia. Glad we ordered this!! It holds better than we thought it would!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R. Couch

customer_reviews.title: he asked me to get a medium which works fine around his hip area
customer_reviews.text: my husband says it works very well for his needs, he asked me to get a medium which works fine around his hip area, but sitting with it on, say driving to his worksite, it is a little uncomfortable, perhaps I might order the large to see if that helps. Overall, it has helped him, and therefore the product gets 4 stars....
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hand

customer_reviews.title: The brace works well to keep my hernia from bulging out.
customer_reviews.text: The brace works well for me to keep my double hernia from bulging out. With the hernia in held in place I am experiencing much less pain. The brace is very adjustable due to its Velcro design. The only improvement I would make is that the two pads that you position over the hernia need to have removable covers to facilitate washing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It works very well and is comfortable. I am building a home and have done ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hernia support belt I have ordered from this company. It works very well and is comfortable. I am building a home and have done all phases of construction including 800 sq ft of floor tile using this belt. I will be having surgery soon but this belt has been a lifesaver for me and I recommend it. I have tried several previous belts from other companies that were uncomfortable and just did not work for me. This one is easily adjustable for single or double.
customer_reviews.author: martinb1213

customer_reviews.title: They don't tell you but this particular one is NOT ELIGIBLE FOR REFUND
customer_reviews.text: I order three kinds for my dad so he could just see the pkg and compare by reading them and looking over them and he decided not to get them because he decided a size bigger would probably work better. When I went to return all three THIS ONE COULD NOT BE RETURNED EVEN THOUGH IT HAD NOT BEEN OPENED OR WORN. First time I've ever not been able to return something that was not right for us from Amazon. REALLY MAD THEY DON'T TELL YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate buy this right away
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to have my hernia surgery for two months and the pain and swelling became more frequent. I purchased this trust and now I’m able to do my regular 3 mile walk, yardwork, lifting, gardening and basically everything I need to do. It is not a replacement for surgery but it’s essential if you have to wait any period of time
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mooney

customer_reviews.title: I want you to know, this product is by far the best support that I;ve had to date
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this support. The support that I purchased from you supports me far better than my previous support ever did. I Iike the larger sized pressure pads. They really help to hold my hernia in place,
customer_reviews.author: William B. Feemster

customer_reviews.title: Overall usable, although it rides too low therefore it ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall usable, although it rides too low therefore it slowly slips downward. Unfortunately the pressure pads are too thick and too round, exerting too much concentrated pressure. Will have to use some makeshift pads that have a thinner, more gradual profile and pressure applied. Also sling adjustment possibility quite limited.
customer_reviews.author: emerani

customer_reviews.title: Wonder care Hernia belt handling
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent! I however have serious reservations about the handling of product shipment and customer needs! If they have problems with the shipper, they need to proactively take care of the situation and/or change the shipper! This will definitely affect their credibility!
customer_reviews.author: Riaz

customer_reviews.title: Gives the support you need!
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put on by yourself at first, but gets easier after a few days. Get on right and the pain is gone!

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY EFFECTIVE AND COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are correct! This product is wonderful! I have been suffering with my hernia for weeks waiting to see the doctor for a repair. I couldn't take it anymore so I risked the money and bought this, fully certain that it would not be effective. I could not have been more wrong! Buy this product. Removable pads? How can you go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Oil

customer_reviews.title: Does what is designed for.
customer_reviews.text: I have really liked this hernia belt. It has supported my double hernias very well. The only reason I didn’t give it 4 stars is there was no care instructions that I could find so I will have to be careful when I clean it.
customer_reviews.author: DTCarr

customer_reviews.title: The company double checked to make sure I was satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: The product does help with hernia. The had me remeasure and were able to remake the straps so they were longer and the fit was much better.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Hernia Belt
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son with a large hernia. This belt provided immediate relief and was more cost effective than his earlier medically purchased belt.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: This belt works great and has numerous means of adjustment
customer_reviews.text: This belt works great and has numerous means of adjustment. I purchased this in an effort to delay a hernia until after ski season. I have used it skiing all day and totally forgot about my hernia while wearing it. You may find that you do not need to use the pressure egg on the inside of the belt normally place to put pressure in on the hernia bulge if the belt is adjusted snugly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hart

customer_reviews.title: The Back Biter
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy lower back pain, this is the belt for you. If you want a product that feels like it was made in five minutes— here ya go! The bands shrivel up like a snail does when you lay a coat of salt on it. I’ve already ironed it flat once in the first three days I received it, and I am on to do it again today. Can’t wait till I receive my other belt. Keep away, Hernia belt seekers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever!
customer_reviews.text: Who ever designed this thing never had a hernia. The pads are way too thick and the straps that go from front to the back will not draw tight enough to do any good. I can not wear this piece of junk! I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally posted a one star review because the support didn't fit properly and wasn't returnable. I thought I was stuck with a well made quality product that I couldn't use and couldn't return. I changed the review to five star after Wonder Care contacted me to offer either an exchange or full refund. This kind of customer service gives me confidence to do business with them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Yes! Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Not really good at taking time to write reviews. Just wanted to thank the creator and manufacturer of this product. I was nearly frozen to my bed or recliner due to pain from an inguinal hernia. Put this on and got relief instantly! I can perform physical activities for hours when wearing it--pain free! Sweet!

If I do not get the surgery soon, I will definitely purchase a second to be used as a spare.

customer_reviews.title: The style of this support works better for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: It is quite effective to hold the hernia down. The style of this support works better for that purpose ,better than so many others that I am buying thru the years.. Most likely I will get another one soon. I got two more and I keep the same good opinion of the truss

customer_reviews.author: C.Malec

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjustability, good support, and well made
customer_reviews.text: Great adjustability and extra pad gives good inward pressure to keep my hernia pressed inward. The straps between your legs comes off easily for cleaning without having to wash the hole unit. I feel much safer while waiting to see a doctor and my most likely surgery.

customer_reviews.title: Works for DAD!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 89 year old dad who does not have Hernia surgery as an option. It was a bit difficult for him to figure out how to wear it but once he got it he LOVES it. He likes that its not noticeable through his pants. HE is very happy with this product.....thanks.

customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: My elderly dad has been told by his doctor that his heart is not in good enough shape for anesthesia to have his hernia surgically repaired (again). This belt gives him comfort. He uses just one of the two included compression pillows on the side of the hernia.
customer_reviews.author: ladyDAR

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best truss I have seen or worn
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best truss I have seen or worn. Secure, comfortable, practical to use. Seems to be sturdily built. I am looking into various surgery options for my third hernia repair, and I don't feel the need to rush into a hasty decision.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I do not have time for surgery so I use it to keep everything in place; it works great! I have been carrying on with my regular physical routine with no issue. Great support and as belts go, pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TJL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Keeps hernia in place and very easy to put on. Its comfortable too. I would recommend it with anyone with a inguinal hernia.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this particular brand for its quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I definitely recommend this particular brand for its quality and comfort, material is fair quality for its price, Velcro adjustments are great. I purchase other brands which went straight to the garbage can buy not this one. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: This Hernia belt has stop most of all pain and bulging of the groin Hernia.
customer_reviews.text: This hernia belt has allowed me to postpone surgery, far superior to any other product that I have worn! The pressure pads allow you to adjust them at the exact place of the hernia. I would recommend this product "5 stars+".
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Kullmer Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Ordered large size for 34 inch waist. Large way to small. If I could wear it after some time trying to figure out how to put it together, a problem. You put the thing on then you have a pad you push down from the waist line to the point of the hernia. Nothing to hold the pad in place, The pad seems to seek out its own conform zone. Sorry, I don't like writing bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: helen e.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a torture device, but it does quite well. I would recommend it. I have a rather significant double hernia and I notice a substantial positive difference.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Looney,Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It’s very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a large one piece unit that was a wrap type and it was always moving. This stays in place and more comfortable than the other. Lots of adjustment to make it fit. I ordered a second unit and it looked used and was missing parts. Returned it no problem and got a new one in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: william f berner

customer_reviews.title: wirks great
customer_reviews.text: the product works fine. the strap around the leg gets a little uncomfortable at times, but is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A Baker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable once adjusted - customize fit for everyone
customer_reviews.text: It definitely helps! It kept the hernia pushed in all day doing construction and kept it from hurting. It took a few days to get it adjusted to be comfortable...something everyone will have to do. The straps that go in between the legs can definitely be adjusted in the back to keep the straps from ridding up the middle in back...lol...not comfortable...once adjusted it was great! The hernia pads in front work great because you can adjust them to fit exactly where you need it. I definitely would recommend this to anyone. I am using mine to put off an operation and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Vallejo Jr

customer_reviews.title: Holds my bulging hernia firmly and helps with the pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have surgery in 10 days but my inguinal hernia was bulging a lot. The device works well and is sturdy. Quality Velcro; does the job. One warning: it takes about 90-120 seconds to get out of this thing in order to take a leak so give yourself adequate time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Too small hard to return
customer_reviews.text: This didn't fit but we double measured. I tried to return it but so far I can't. I will update if the seller does the return
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Habermeyer

customer_reviews.title: GET IT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Yes it's ugly and awkward at first, but nobody is going see it. It actually hides pretty well under gym shorts. More importantly, it works by providing excellent support/compression for an inguinal hernia.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Works till you can get hernia surgery
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34 inch waist and the M size fits perfect. Well constructed and actually works, I did not need either of the form pads that came with the truss. Note: Wear this over a pair of boxer shorts. Much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable! I ordered the XL instead of the L ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made, well fitting, reasonably priced and most of all... comfortable! I ordered the XL instead of the L and I have plenty of adjustment to size down if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Remaly

customer_reviews.title: To much discomfort while standing for long periods without the belt which was pretty much eliminated with the Brace
customer_reviews.text: As others have said saved our vacation while awaiting the scheduled hernia surgery date. To much discomfort while standing for long periods without the belt which was pretty much eliminated with the Brace, important while viewing museums. Certainly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DG808

customer_reviews.title: Inguinal Hernia Support Belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt is exactly what I need. It is adjustable on all sides via tough, durable Velcro. However, it does take a little getting used to at the beginning. It also arrived well before its promised date.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott F. Parivar, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: one person can't put it in place correctly
customer_reviews.text: I have a double hernia and tried to put it on but the velcro fasteners are in a position hard to attach. The pads are too thick and bulge out. Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: valuvestor

customer_reviews.title: Been opened and used
customer_reviews.text: It has been opened and probably tried on by someone! You can tell it’s been repacked.The box was also opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice producer
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but be careful, no return. This was too large
customer_reviews.author: Jammac

customer_reviews.title: Great Support and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ease to wear providing great support and comfort. Quality material and construction. Would recommend to others needing a truss post-operative hernia surgery.
customer_reviews.author: CordovaTiger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Support
customer_reviews.text: Recently had triple hernia surgery and these have been a very comfortable support option while I have been healing. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Giles R. Madruga III

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I had to wear it for about 3 months before I had surgery. Pretty comfortable and did what it was supposed to do. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: ADKZAAZ

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to say if it helps, according ...
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to say if it helps, according to one doc it is questionable, while another said his dad had one and never did have surgery. It does had a wide range of adjustment and puts pressure on the ruptured area. But it does have to be removed to go to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: H. Garth Beerman

customer_reviews.title: it's okay
customer_reviews.text: This could use some improvement. Especially the waist band. It get's all twisted up. I tried ironing out the twists, but no go. That's why I give it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: G.W

customer_reviews.title: When I feel pain in the area I put on this hernia belt and if gives me great support and relieves the pain
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me a lot. Some days I feel a lot of pain from my repaired hernia that did not stay repaired. I need to have another hernia surgery to repair the first fix. When I feel pain in the area I put on this hernia belt and if gives me great support and relieves the pain. I would recommend this belt to anyone having pain from an inguinal hernia. It really does work!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes Truss
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the hernia truss. He says it helps make walking more comfortable as he waits for surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Harrington

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, but if you need one you should get a surgical repair done.
customer_reviews.author: bobteague2000

customer_reviews.title: material changed in quality from one order to another.
customer_reviews.text: Thr first one that we bought the material was thicker and stayed in place, the second one the material was of less quality, the straps moved and became very unconfortable, Had to sew them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable
customer_reviews.text: It was too small and Not able to return. I should have read all the details so we just wasted our money
customer_reviews.author: MiMi 3

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of two pads
customer_reviews.text: The belt provided me almost instant relief. I only used one of the pads, as my problem is on one side. I like the idea of two pads, as I might use both of them on the affected area. The velcro straps are removable and I find that a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: The adjustment straps make it easer to fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my father. He has several hernias that are inoperable. The truss fits him well and he is wearing it short periods trying to get used to it. The adjustment straps make it easer to fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This belt is much better than those purchased in the past. Better material, design, and function. If you're unhappy with your current belt try this one.
customer_reviews.author: DHR
